title: SNAP!

sections.heading: HOW TO PLAY
sections.body:
• Record "next" on one switch and "Snap!" on the other.
• Lay down a card or a motivating image.
• When the switch user presses the "next" switch, place another card on top of the previous one to form a pile.
• When two identical cards appear after each other, the switch user can press the "Snap!" switch to win a point.

tooltipText: Use 2 switches to scan through motivating images to play the matching game 'Snap!'
